thread.title: Lady Gaga Electrifies at Super Bowl LI
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga Electrifies at Super Bowl LI

title: Lady Gaga Electrifies at Super Bowl LI
text: Yahoo Music February 6, 2017 Lady Gaga didn’t rely on any special guests — or even particularly special effects — to thrill the crowd at Houston’s NRG Stadium during Super Bowl LI’s halftime show. After executing a bungee-cord-anchored dive through the stadium roof, the performance relied instead on Gaga’s talent, pure and simple, as she danced fiercely through a medley of her greatest hits, including “Poker Face,” “Born This Way,” “Telephone,” and “Just Dance.” And, the notoriously edgy fashionista didn’t even indulge in a multitude of costume changes: Opening up in a silver bodysuit, the singer made a single change toward the end of her set into a color-coordinated bodysuit to close out the electric, energetic show.
